title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - April 13th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - April 13th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring:

-Joe Nocera on the legend of Jacinto’s gold

-Matt Boyle on Wegman’s attempt to take on the Big Apple

-Claire Boston on college grads selling stakes in themselves to Wall Street investors

-Dimitra Kessenides with ways to save for retirement

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
